transcript.text: How much do you know about what competition laws promote? Select all the options you think are true here, and then click on Submit.

contentText.text: What purpose do competition laws serve?

instructionText.text: Click on Next (bottom right arrow) to continue.

extraInstructionText.text: There may be more than one correct answer.

optionContent.option: Punish companies who are too successful

correct.text: Competition laws aim to ensure that companies are successful for the right reasons: because they offer the best products, services and prices. They are not intended to punish success, discourage growth or introduce trade barriers.
Competition laws affect the way we interact with the outside world, including competitors, suppliers, distributors and customers.

It's very important that you know how competition laws apply to you and that you comply with these laws wherever you work and do business. In this module, we'll cover competition law principles and practices.
